fi.tuni.blogproject

Class BlogItemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tuni.blogproject.BlogItemController

  • @RestController
public class BlogItemController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest Controller for modifying BlogItems in the database.
    Author:
    Jimi Savola - jimi.savola@tuni.fi

    • Method Detail

      • handleRequest

        @RequestMapping(value="/addBlogItem",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public BlogItem handleRequest(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                   BlogItem b)
        Adds a new BlogItem to database.
        Parameters:
        b - BlogItem to be added into database.
        Returns:
        Added BlogItem.

      • editBlogItem

        @RequestMapping(value="/editBlogItem",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public BlogItem editBlogItem(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                   BlogItem b)
        Edits the BlogItem data.

        Only title and content can be modified. Original post date and author is used.

        Parameters:
        b - BlogItem to be edited.
        Returns:
        Edited BlogItem.

      • deleteBlogItem

        @DeleteMapping(value="/deleteBlogItem/{blogId}")
public java.util.Optional<BlogItem> deleteBlogItem(@PathVariable
                                                                                                     java.lang.String blogId)
        Deletes a BlogItem from the database.

        Before the BlogItem is deleted, first deletes all the Comments and tags, this this BlogItem has, if there are any.

        Parameters:
        blogId - Id of the BlogItem to be deleted.
        Returns:
        Deleted BlogItem.

      • getBlogItems

        @GetMapping(value="/getBlogItems")
public java.lang.Iterable<BlogItem> getBlogItems()
        Gets all of the BlogItems in the database.

        Makes an ArrayList of all BlogItems and sorts them by date using BlogItems compareTo -method.

        Returns:
        All BlogItems.

      • getBlogItem

        @GetMapping(value="getBlogItem/{blogId}")
public java.util.Optional<BlogItem> getBlogItem(@PathVariable
                                                                                           java.lang.String blogId)
        Gets a single BlogItem from the database.
        Parameters:
        blogId - Id of the BlogItem to be searched from the database.
        Returns:
        BlogItem with the id used for searching.
